data.eml:eml: New water mite species (Acari, Hydrachnidia) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tuzovskij, Petr V. (2013): New water mite species (Acari, Hydrachnidia) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3700 (4): 547-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3700.4.3
